Name: crude manipulators
Short: You don't really have hands.
Description: You never have a free hand for the purposes of grappling, inflicting disadvantage on all Grapple attacks. You cannot use fine motor skills.

Name: storm surge
Short: Attacks made with advantage knock creatures prone.
Description: Whenever you hit with an attack that you had advantage on, knock the creature you hit prone.

Name: insidious
Short: Damage from afflictions can't be prevented.
Description: Damage dealt by afflictions to creatures within 120 feet of you cannot be prevented in any way. It ignores resistance, immunity and absorption.

Name: cruel grasp
Short: Apply afflictions when you grapple.
Description: At the end of each of your turns, apply 3 stacks of the specified affliction to each creature you have grappled.

Name: cruel attacks
Short: Apply afflictions when you hit with an attack.
Description: Whenever you hit a creature with an attack, apply 1 stack of the specified affliction.

Name: slip away
Short: Disengage when you hit with basic attacks.
Description: Whenever you hit with a basic attack, gain the benefits of the Disengage minor action.

Name: magical splashing
Short: Single target attacks hit all nearby creatures instead.
Description: Every single target attack you make hits all creatures within 5 feet instead. If more than one creature is within range of this effect, the attack deals half damage. You may now target empty tiles with your single target attacks.

Name: forceful shield
Short: Blocking melee attacks knocks enemies back.
Description: Whenever you use the Block reaction against a melee attack, knock the attacker back 15 feet.

Name: stubborn shield
Short: Resist forced movement and grappling when you block.
Description: Whenever you use the Block reaction, also gain the effect of the Resist reaction.

Name: escaping shield
Short: You are blown away when you Block.
Description: Whenever you use the Block reaction, you are pushed back 15 feet away from the source of the damage.

Name: pulverizing
Short: Land criticals on prone creatures.
Description: Your critical hit threshold is reduced by 3 against creatures who are prone.

Name: elemental aura
Short: Deal elemental damage to those around you at the end of each of your turns.
Description: At the end of each of your turns, deal 3 damage of the specified element to all creatures within 5 feet of you.

Name: imbued aura
Short: Apply a condition to those around you at the end of each of your turns.
Description: At the end of each of your turns, make a special attack of the specified type against all other creatures within 5 feet of you. If you hit, apply one stack of the specified condition.

Name: cruel aura
Short: Apply afflictions to those around you at the end of each of your turns.
Description: At the end of each of your turns, apply two stack of the specified affliction to all other creatures within 5 feet of you.

Name: assured aura
Short: Apply a guaranteed condition to those around you at the end of each of your turns.
Description: At the end of each of your turns, apply one stack of the specified condition to all other creatures within 5 feet of you.

Name: absorbing
Short: Restore essence when you block.
Description: The first time in a round that you use your Block reaction, restore 2 essence.

Name: regrowth
Short: Regain essence whenever you end your turn without spending any.
Description: At the end of each of your turns in combat in which you did not spend essence, gain 2 essence.

Name: replenishing
Short: Restore essence when you hit.
Description: The first time in a round that you hit an enemy with an attack, restore 1 essence.

Name: thirsting
Short: Drain essence, but regain it when others go down.
Description: At the end of each of your turns in which you spent essence, lose 1 essence. Whenever a creature within 30 feet of you is reduced to below 0 life, restore 5 essence.

Name: elemental grasp
Short: Deal damage to creatures you are grappling.
Description: At the end of your turn, creatures you are grappling take 1d6 damage of the specified type.

Name: imbued grasp
Short: Apply a condition to creatures you are grappling.
Description: At the end of each of your turns, apply the specified condition to each creature you are grappling.

Name: vampiric
Short: Regain life when you hit enemies.
Description: When you hit an enemy with an attack for the first time in a round, restore 2 life.

Name: accelerating
Short: You boons also grant movement speed.
Description: The first time each round that you apply a boon to an ally, their movement speed is increased by 10 feet next round.

Name: revealing
Short: Your Expose attacks automatically hit.
Description: Your Expose attacks automatically hit.

Name: careful aim
Short: Minor action to gain advantage on next basic attack.
Description: As a minor action, you may gain advantage on the next basic attack you make this turn.

Name: attributes
Short: Increase an attribute once.
Description: Increase an attribute of your choice by 1.

Name: shifting
Short: You can select between two forms of these arms.
Description: These arms have two forms. As a minor action, or upon making a basic attack, you may choose which of the two forms' mundane affixes to use.

Name: superior reach
Short: Gain a 15 foot reach.
Description: The area that you threaten increases to a 15 foot radius. The range of your basic melee attacks increases to 15 feet.

Name: titanic
Short: Wield huge weapons with a single hand.
Description: You may ignore the two-handed property of weapons, and wield them using only one hand.

Name: shock absorbing
Short: Your Block is stronger, and causes you to be pushed away.
Description: Your Block reaction always absorbs maximum damage. You are shoved 5 feet back away from the source of the attack whenever you use the Block reaction.

Name: headstrong
Short: Get advantage on basic and Shove attacks when you charge.
Description: Whenever you move at least 10 feet in a straight line, you have advantage on all melee basic and Shove attacks made against creatures in front of you.

Name: flattening
Short: When you hit a creature with a critical strike, knock them prone.
Description: When you hit a creature with a critical strike, knock them prone.

Name: taunt
Short: Minor action and Presence attack to apply taunted.
Description: As a minor action, make a Presence attack against a creature within 30 feet; applying taunted if you hit.

Name: keen eye
Short: Your critical hit threshold is reduced by one.
Description: Your critical hit threshold is reduced by one for all attacks.

Name: precise eye
Short: Your critical hit threshold is reduced by two when you have advantage.
Description: Your critical hit threshold is reduced by two for all attacks that you make with advantage.

Name: attraction
Short: Pull creatures you hit towards you.
Description: Whenever you strike a creature with an attack, pull them 10 feet directly towards you.

Name: repulsion
Short: Knock creatures away when you hit them.
Description: Whenever you hit a creature with an attack, knock them back 10 feet directly away from you.

Name: colors of the rainbow
Short: Pick from three damage types whenever you deal damage.
Description: Whenever you make an attack, select one of the three specified damage types for the attack to deal.

Name: uniformity
Short: All you always deal exactly as much damage as you should.
Description: Damage that you deal ignores all resistances, immunities and vulnerabilities to damage types. All damage you deal is physical.

Name: jubilation
Short: Regain essence on critical hits.
Description: The first time each round that you hit an enemy with an attack that is a critical hit, restore 3 essence.

Name: expandable stomach
Short: You may swallow any size of creature.
Description: You may swallow any size of creature.

Name: grappling
Short: Gain advantage on Grapple attacks and skill checks to maintain a grapple.
Description: Gain advantage on Grapple attacks and skill checks to maintain a grapple.

Name: grasping reach
Short: Grapple and Shove from further away.
Description: The range of your Grapple and Shove attacks is increased by 5 feet. You no longer suffer disadvantage on Grapple attacks due to not having a free hand.

Name: overpowering grasp
Short: Automatically Shove creatures you have grappled.
Description: You automatically hit with all Shove attacks against creatures you have grappled.

Name: lingering grasp
Short: Apply a condition when a creature breaks free from your grapple.
Description: Whenever a creature breaks free of your grapple, apply the specified condition.

Name: range
Short: Double your range.
Description: Double the range of all of your ranged attacks and powers.

Name: archer hunter
Short: Enemy ranged attacks provoke attacks of opportunity.
Description: Creatures who make a ranged attack while you are threatening them provoke an attack of opportunity.

Name: mage hunter
Short: Enemies who spend essence provoke attacks of opportunity.
Description: Creatures who spend essence while you are threatening them provoke an attack of opportunity.

Name: combat medic
Short: Make Treat checks with advantage.
Description: You have advantage on all skill checks made to use the Treat major action.

Name: seasoned medic
Short: Use Treat as a minor action.
Description: You may use the Treat major action as a minor action instead.

Name: telemedicine
Short: Treat creatures within 30 feet.
Description: You may use the Treat major action on any creature within 30 feet of you.

Name: shield throw
Short: Throw your shield for extra damage.
Description: Your arms gain the thrown and returning properties, and deal additional damage equal to the amount that you would normally Block with them on hit. However, when thrown, they do not return to you until the start of your next turn.

Name: corpse explosion
Short: Creatures that you kill explode.
Description: Whenever you reduce a creature to less than 0 life, its body explodes for decay damage equal to 1/4 of its maximum life to all creatures within 10 feet of it.

Name: negativity
Short: Being healed damages those nearby.
Description: Whenever you are healed (except through resting), each other creature within 10 feet of you takes that much decay damage.

Name: friendly fire
Short: You cannot effect allies in combat, and vice versa.
Description: You cannot damage or apply boons conditions, afflictions or forced movement to your allies, and vice versa. This also applies to any other powers that you might use.

Name: karma
Short: Damage hurts the attacker as well.
Description: Whenever you take damage, deal that much radiant damage to the attacker. Whenever you deal damage, other than by this effect, lose that much life.

Name: shadow boxing
Short: Fight creatures you banished with a shadow copy.
Description: Whenever a creature that you have banished takes a turn, it interacts with a copy of yourself. You and the creature begin the same distance away from each other as in the real world, but no other creatures, effects or objects are present. The creature may act on its turn while banished, but may only interact with the shadow copy of yourself, which shares all attributes with you, including your life and essence pool. After the creature acts, your shadow copy takes a turn and may act as usual, but may only interact with the banished creature.

Name: charge attack
Short: Major action to empower your next attack.
Description: You may spend a major action to Charge. The next attack you make before the end of your next turn has advantage and is treated as a critical if it hits.

Name: risk
Short: Gain advantage on attacks, but then attacks have advantage against you.
Description: Whenever you make an attack, you may choose to gain advantage on it. If you do, attacks against you have advantage until the start of your next turn. This effect does not stack in duration if you use this feature multiple times in a turn.

Name: shifting tides
Short: Attacks made with disadvantage cause you to gain advantage and vice versa.
Description: After you make an attack with advantage, gain disadvantage on all attacks made before the end of your next turn. After you make an attack with disadvantage, gain advantage on all attacks made before the end of your next turn.

Name: tidal arms
Short: Alternate advantage and disadvantage on attacks between turns.
Description: At the start of combat, gain ebb. At the start of your turn if you have ebb, gain flow, which grants advantage on all attack rolls. At the start of your turn if you have flow, gain ebb, which inflicts disadvantage on all attack rolls.

Name: malediction
Short: Afflictions and conditions transfer when creatures go down.
Description: Whenever a creature within 120 feet of you is reduced to less than 0 life, transfer all of its afflictions and conditions to the nearest creature within 15 feet of it.

Name: breakthrough pain
Short: Critical hits trigger afflictions.
Description: Whenever you land a critical hit on a creature, trigger all afflictions that they have on them.

Name: precision casting
Short: Hit only specific creatures with area of effect powers.
Description: Whenever you use an area of effect power, it instead targets three specific creatures within the area of effect instead. If there are fewer than three creatures within the area of effect, it hits all of those in the area of effect instead.

Name: accelerated blows
Short: Strike as a minor action, but with disadvantage.
Description: You may take the Strike action as a minor action, but suffer disadvantage on that attack if you do so. You cannot spend essence as part of this minor action.

Name: bodyslam
Short: Follow Shove attacks through until you push a creature against a wall.
Description: Whenever you Shove a creature, you may continue to push them back in a straight line, following them by spending movement, until you either run out of movement, the tile behind them is not free or they collide with a solid surface. If they collide with a surface, they are knocked prone.

Name: momentary respite
Short: Banish creatures you strike, but only until the start of their next turn.
Description: Whenever you strike a creature with an attack, they are banished until the start of their next turn.

Name: chivalry
Short: As a minor action, enter a duel with a creature until one of you drops.
Description: As a minor action, you can make a Presence attack against a creature you can see within 30 feet. If you hit, you taunt and are taunted by that creature until one of you is dropped unconscious or you are no longer within 120 feet of each other. While both of you are taunted, all other attacks made against either of you have disadvantage.

Name: firestarter
Short: Your warmth is contagious.
Description: At the end of each of your turns while you are aflame, every creature within 5 feet becomes aflame. You may set yourself aflame as a minor action.

Name: strange flames
Short: Apply conditions to creatures who are aflame.
Description: At the start of each of your turns, apply the specified condition to each creature within 120 feet of you who is aflame.

Name: infection
Short: Basic attacks apply blunted if the creature already has a condition.
Description: After you hit a creature with a basic attack, apply blunted if the creature already has at least one stack of a condition.

Name: insane laughter
Short: Minor action to cause everyone around you to go insane, including yourself.
Description: As a minor action, you may apply two stacks of madness to yourself. If you do, make a Presence attack against all other creatures within a 15 foot radius, inflicting madness on a hit.

Name: mass insanity
Short: 20s inflict area madness.
Description: Whenever you roll a 20 when making an attack, apply two stacks of madness to all creatures within 10 feet of your target.

Name: sinister
Short: Major action Focus attack to transfer a condition.
Description: As a major action, make a Focus attack against a creature within 30 feet. If you hit, transfer one condition from yourself to them.

Name: rot
Short: Basic attacks apply withered if the creature is already suffering from a condition.
Description: After you hit a creature with a basic attack, apply withered if the creature already has at least one stack of a condition.

Name: stench
Short: Poison those around you with your stench.
Description: At the end of each of your turns, make a Focus attack against all creatures within 5 feet of you. If you hit, apply blunted.

Name: shared suffering
Short: Share conditions that you gain to those nearby.
Description: Conditions that you gain are also applied to all creatures within 5 feet of you.

Name: magical disaster
Short: Rolling a 1 causes everyone nearby to become very unstable.
Description: Whenever you roll a 1 when making an attack, apply 10 stacks of unstable to all creatures within 120 feet.

Name: martyr
Short: Minor action to take on a condition.
Description: As a minor action, transfer one condition from a creature within 30 feet to yourself.

Name: necrotic strike
Short: Basic attacks block healing and life gain.
Description: Whenever you hit a creature with a basic attack, they cannot regain life or gain absorption until the end of their next turn.

Name: piercing agony
Short: Absorbed damage causes life loss.
Description: Whenever damage you deal is absorbed, that creature loses the same amount of life.

Name: terminal
Short: Nearby creatures cannot heal or gain absorption.
Description: Creatures within 10 feet of you, other than yourself, cannot regain life or gain absorption.

Name: in the thick of it
Short: Your critical hit threshold is reduced by 1 for each creature threatening you.
Description: Your critical hit threshold is reduced by 1 for each creature threatening you.

Name: stonecunning
Short: Defend in order to line up a critical hit.
Description: Whenever you take the Defend major action, the next attack that you make before the end of your next turn is a critical hit if it lands.

Name: unthinking rage
Short: Deal maximized damage but take double damage.
Description: All attacks you hit with deal maximum damage. Gain vulnerability to all damage.

Name: verdant touch
Short: Creature difficult terrain when you hit with attacks.
Description: Whenever you hit a creature with an attack, create difficult terrain in a 5 foot radius around them that persists until you complete a rest.

Name: wild hunt
Short: Your attacks are much more accurate while on difficult terrain.
Description: While on difficult terrain, you have advantage on all attacks. Otherwise, you have disadvantage on all attacks.

Name: chaos
Short: Randomly teleport creatures you strike.
Description: Whenever you strike a creature with an attack, it is teleported to a random empty square within 10 feet of its previous location.

Name: momentary closeness
Short: Minor action to pull a creature close, before they return at the end of the turn.
Description: As a minor action, make a Prowess attack against a creature within 30 feet of you. If you hit, they are pulled to the nearest empty tile within 5 feet of you. They return to their original position at the end of your turn.

Name: recoil
Short: Basic attacks push you away from your target.
Description: Whenever you make a basic attack, you are knocked back 5 feet away from your target.

Name: bodyswap
Short: Swap places with creatures you interact with.
Description: Whenever you hit a creature with an attack or apply a boon to them, swap locations with them. If you affect multiple creatures at once, you may choose which one you swap with.

Name: elemental bond
Short: Elemental beam connects all creatures with this affix, damaging those who cross it.
Description: You are connected to every other creature within 30 feet of you that shares this affix with a stream of elemental energy. These streams follow a direct path between you, ignoring obstacles. Whenever a creature begins its turn in a tile that contains at least one of these streams, or enters one for the first time in its turn, deal 2d6 damage of the specified elemental damage type to it.

Name: elemental conversion
Short: You only deal one elemental damage type, but negate resistances and immunity to it.
Description: All damage you deal is converted to the specified element. Ignore all resistances to this element, and treat creatures immune to this element as if they were resistant.

Name: echo of the elements
Short: Each elemental damage type that you inflict deals damage to those around you.
Description: At the end of each of your turns, for each type of elemental damage that you dealt, deal 1d4 damage of that element type to all other creatures within 5 feet of you.

Name: bubbling instability
Short: Spread damage taken from afflictions to all within 10 feet.
Description: Whenever you take damage due an affliction, deal that much eldritch damage to all creatures other than you within 10 feet.

Name: life tap
Short: Spend life to pay essence costs.
Description: Whenever you would spend essence, you may take half that much umbral damage instead, rounded up. You may not use this feature to provide essence for abilities that heal you. This damage ignores resistance and immunity.

Name: twilight focus
Short: While at 0 life or below, ignore all essence costs.
Description: While at 0 life or below, ignore all essence costs.

Name: gelatinous
Short: Grapple creatures that accidentally try to walk through you.
Description: Enemy creatures may pass through your tiles. Whenever a creature passes through your tile, automatically make a Grapple attack against them.

Name: grapple with the ineffable
Short: Grapple slippery creatures.
Description: You may now grapple intangible creatures or those without a solid body. You have advantage on any skill checks made to prevent creatures from escaping from your grapples.

Name: necrotic grasp
Short: Grappling blocks healing and life gain.
Description: Creature that you are grappling cannot regain life or gain absorption.

Name: grounded
Short: Use an additional consumable each rest.
Description: You may use an additional consumable per rest before needing to make Artifice checks to avoid exhaustion.

Name: vital force
Short: While at full life, gain advantage on all attacks.
Description: While at full life, gain advantage on all attacks.

Name: pull into twilight
Short: Always crit while below 0 life.
Description: While you are below 0 life, any attack you hit with is treated as a critical hit.

Name: cursing
Short: Apply cursed to creatures when you roll a 1 while attempting to hit them.
Description: Whenever you roll a 1 while attempting to hit a creature with an attack, apply 3 cursed to that creature.

Name: twisted
Short: Swap around modifiers to your basic and special attacks.
Description: Use your special attack modifier for basic attacks, and your basic attack modifier for special attacks. Effects that grant you advantage or disadvantage on basic attacks apply to special attacks instead and vice versa.

Name: humiliation
Short: Make a powerful attack of opportunity against creatures who roll a 1 while attacking you.
Description: Whenever you are targeted by an attack by a creature you are threatening and your opponent rolls a 1, you may spend a reaction to make an attack of opportunity against them. Do not roll for this attack, instead treat it as if you had rolled a 20.

Name: antimatter
Short: Gain absorption instead of dealing damage.
Description: Whenever you would deal damage, gain that much absorption instead.

Name: healing
Short: Treat action lets allies heal themselves.
Description: Whenever you use the Treat major action, the beneficiary may spend essence equal to their aptitude bonus to restore twice that much life to themselves. They cannot benefit from this effect while unconscious.

Name: curing
Short: You must cure a condition every round.
Description: At the end of each of your turns, you must remove a single stack of a condition from a creature of your choice within 30 feet of you.

Name: accelerated grasp
Short: Grapple as a minor action, but with disadvantage.
Description: You may take the Grapple action as a minor action, but suffer disadvantage on that attack if you do so. You cannot spend essence as part of this minor action.

Name: cartoon physics
Short: Forced movement is twice as effective on both you and your foes.
Description: All forced movement that you apply is twice as effective as usual, but forced movement against you is also twice as effective.

Name: conserved momentum
Short: Your forced movement pushes you in the opposite direction.
Description: All forced movement that you apply moves you the same distance in the opposite direction.

Name: followthrough
Short: Your forced movement pulls you in the same direction.
Description: All forced movement that you apply moves you the same distance in the same direction.

Name: shared affliction
Short: Share afflictions that you gain to those nearby.
Description: Afflictions that you gain are also applied to all creatures within 5 feet of you.

Name: magnanimous
Short: Gain the effects of boons you apply to your enemies.
Description: Whenever you apply a boon to an enemy creature, also gain its effect.

Name: philanthropic
Short: Transfer your absorption when you grant boons.
Description: After you grant a boon to an ally, transfer all absorption, conditions and afflictions that you currently have to them. You only gain this benefit the first time each round that this triggers. You now lose all absorption at the start of each of your turns.

Name: bottled luck
Short: Sacrifice advantage to gain luck. Spend luck to gain advantage.
Description: Whenver you would make an attack with advantage, you may instead make an attack without advantage and gain one luck. You may spend one luck before you make any attack to gain advantage on that attack. Maximum of three luck.

Name: dull
Short: Ignore advantage and disadvantage on attacks.
Description: Roll one d20 when making attack rolls even when you have advantage or disadvantage.

Name: controlled
Short: You may make your effects smaller.
Description: You may reduce the area of effect of your powers as desired, but may not change their shape.

Name: expansive
Short: Increase the area of effect of your abilities.
Description: The area of effect of your powers increases. Any distance which scales with area or volume (such as radius or side length) is now 1.5 times larger. Any linear distance (such as the length of a wall created) is now 2 times larger.  Round all distances up to the nearest 5 feet.

Name: focused technique
Short: You forget two powers but your Expertise is increased by two.
Description: You forget two powers but your Expertise is increased by two.

Name: singular focus
Short: Increase one attribute immensely at the cost of all others.
Description: Increase an attribute of your choice by 5 and reduce all others by 1. If this would cause you to go over the attribute cap, reduce fewer attributes instead.

Name: singular weakness
Short: Sacrifice one attribute to boost all others.
Description: Reduce an attribute of your choice by 3. Increase all other attributes by 1.

Name: force field
Short: Your Block reaction can be used whenever you take damage and is more powerful.
Description: Increase the damage die of your Block reaction once. You may now use your Block reaction any time you would take damage (such as if lit on fire or falling), rather than only when you are hit with an attack.

Name: trample
Short: Run over prone enemies.
Description: You may move through the tiles of prone enemies, but cannot end your turn there. Deal 1d4 physical damage the first time you do so each turn.

Name: aggravating
Short: Taunt everyone nearby.
Description: As a minor action, you may make a Focus attack against all creatures within 60 feet. Apply taunted to those that you hit.

Name: bad luck protection
Short: You are guaranteed a critical hit eventually.
Description: If you have landed 3 attacks in a row without getting a critical hit, the next attack you hit with is treated as a critical hit.

Name: elemental inversion
Short: You may choose to deal damage of the opposite element.
Description: Whenever you would deal elemental damage, you may choose to deal damage of the opposite element instead.

Name: channeled power
Short: Swap arms depending on whether you wish to spend or regain essence.
Description: You cannot spend essence unless you are wielding these arms. Gain 3 essence at the end of each of your turn if you hit an enemy with an attack while attuned to but not wielding these arms.

Name: grasping appendages
Short: Grapple many creatures at once.
Description: You are no longer limited to grappling one creature at a time. You no longer suffer disadvantage on Grapple attacks due to not having a free hand.

Name: grasping maw
Short: Grapple creatures within a radius instead.
Description: Whenever you make a grapple attack against a creature, target all creatures within 5 feet of them other than yourself. You may only end the grapple on all creatures you have grappled at once.

Name: yanking
Short: Yank creatures that you have grappled around within your reach.
Description: While you have a creature grappled and hit them with a Shove attack, you may move them to any free tile within the range of your grapple.

Name: prone sniper
Short: Better ranged attacks while prone.
Description: You no longer suffer disadvantage on ranged basic attacks while prone. If you make an attack while hidden and prone, your position is not revealed and you remain hidden.

Name: pack tactics
Short: Advantage on all Expose attacks, and on attacks that result from Expose attacks.
Description: You have advantage on all Expose attacks, and advantage on all attacks made as the result of an allyâ€™s Expose attack.

Name: covering fire
Short: Make opportunity attacks against creatures who enter a marked tile.
Description: At the end of your turn, designate a single tile. Whenever a creature enters that tile, you may use your reaction to make an attack of opportunity against it if you are within range.

Name: chains of retrieval
Short: Pull thrown weapons back through your foes.
Description: When you throw a weapon, it stays where you threw it: if it struck a creature, it stays on the tile where they were at the time; if it missed it occupies a random adjacent tile. As a major action, you may Retrieve these weapons, pulling them back to you to be thrown again. When you do so, make an Agility attack against all creatures in the path to return to you. Each creature hit takes damage and effects as if they'd been struck by a basic attack.

Name: deathbringer
Short: Take an extra turn when you drop creatures.
Description: Once per round when you reduce a creature to less than zero life,  take an extra turn immediately after the current one.

Name: master of the basics
Short: Your 0 essence attacks are criticals.
Description: Attacks that you make that do not cost essence are treated as criticals if they hit.

Name: flanking
Short: Advantage on attacks against creatures who are threatened by other creatures.
Description: You have advantage on attacks against creatures who are threatened by a creature other than yourself.

Name: unerring
Short: Gain advantage on all basic attacks.
Description: Gain advantage on all basic attacks.

Name: focused pain
Short: Sacrifice damage for more afflictions.
Description: Attacks that you make that both deal damage and apply afflictions do not deal damage but apply twice as many stacks of afflictions.

Name: splitting
Short: Shoot several creatures at once with ranged basic attacks.
Description: You may target up to three creatures of your choice within range every time you make a basic ranged attack.

Name: well-rounded
Short: Increase all of your attributes by 1.
Description: Increase all of your attributes by 1.

Name: marked strike
Short: Special attacks mark enemies, basic attacks consume the marks to hit all.
Description: Whenever you hit a creature with a special attack, apply a mark to it. When you hit a creature with a basic attack, apply the effects of that basic attack (including damage) to all creatures with a mark and consume all marks.

Name: touch
Short: Ignore your enemy's armor with your basic attacks.
Description: Whenever you make a basic attack, treat your target's defense as if it was 10 + their Agility.

Name: perfect block
Short: Your Block reaction absorbs all damage.
Description: The first time you use your Block reaction in a round, it absorbs all damage from the attack blocked.

Name: focused control
Short: Sacrifice damage for more conditions.
Description: Attacks that you make that both deal damage and apply conditions do not deal damage but apply twice as many stacks of conditions.

Name: pandemic
Short: Conditions spread when they disappear.
Description: Whenever a stack of a condition is removed from a creature within 120 feet of you due to the natural end of turn reduction, add a stack of that condition to all creatures within 10 feet of it.
